knobs.title: target_danceability
knobs.description: How suitable a track is for dancing based on a combination of musical elements including tempo, rhythm stability, beat strength, and overall regularity.

toggles.title: limit
toggles.description: Choose how many tracks to add to your mix from the recommendations.

toggles.title: target_mode
toggles.description: The modality of a track, the type of scale from which its melodic content is derived.
